title: jeremypwr

content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Arsenal + Southampton + São Paulo FCSaturday + Sunday Football Prediction Contest!Game 1:  Southampton vs Man United  (Saturday)Game 2:  Arsenal v Fulham  (Saturday)Game 3:  São Paulo FC v Fortaleza (Sunday)Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  20'  2-0 SouthamptonGame 2:  20'  2-0 ArsenalGame 3:  20'  1-0 São Paulo FCPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mBTC Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mBTC!(Small print) *The declared winners are final and up to my discretion*
